message: I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to start with a price of $1100000.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $900000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
I understand you think the product is a bit pricey, but I believe it's worth more than what you're offering. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'll counter with a price of $1000000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I still think the product is a bit overpriced. I'm willing to pay $950000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll counter with a price of $980000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $920000 for it. Can you reconsider?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $980000, as that's my minimum acceptable price. However, I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a 5-year warranty and a free maintenance package. I'm still at $980000.

I appreciate the extras you're offering, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $920000 for it, and I'm willing to accept the 5-year warranty and free maintenance package. Can you reconsider?

I'm starting to think we're getting a bit stuck. I'm willing to meet you at $950000, which is the midpoint of our last few offers. I'll throw in the 5-year warranty and free maintenance package, and I'll also include a 30-day money-back guarantee. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $900000 for it, and I'll accept the 5-year warranty, free maintenance package, and 30-day money-back guarantee. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to accept, I'll have to consider buying from John for $800000.
